rules_text:
When Slavering Council enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another nonland permanent. If you do, create two 1/1 red Devil creature tokens.
Unearth {1}{B} [i]({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)[/i]
